turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking to book a hotel in San Diego for 3 nights, from July 12th to July 15th. I need it to have a pool and be relatively close to the Gaslamp Quarter. This is so frustrating, I've been searching for hours!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. I can help you with that. Let me check availability for hotels in San Diego with a pool, located near the Gaslamp Quarter, from July 12th to July 15th. How many guests will be staying?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Two adults. And ideally, it would be great if it had free breakfast. I'm also curious, what measures are hotels taking right now to ensure guest safety, given the current health concerns? That's really important to me.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, two adults, looking for free breakfast in addition to the pool and proximity to Gaslamp. As for your question about safety measures, this can vary widely by hotel. I recommend checking the hotel's website directly. Many hotels are listing their current COVID-19 policies there. I see several options fitting your other criteria. The Andaz San Diego and the Hotel Solamar are both popular choices. Would you like me to provide more details on either of those, or perhaps others?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hotel Solamar sounds familiar... tell me more about that one, please. What's the average guest rating and what amenities does it have besides the pool and breakfast we already discussed? This is great, thanks for the help!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You're welcome! Hotel Solamar, a Kimpton Hotel, typically receives an average guest rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars. Beyond the pool and proximity to the Gaslamp Quarter, it also features a rooftop bar, a fitness center, pet-friendly accommodations (if needed), on-site dining, and offers valet parking for a fee. It also offers complimentary evening social hours. Does this sound suitable for your needs?
